attributes.action: Parliament to recommend Captain Tom Moore to be given a knighthood now.
attributes.additional_details: Because hes raised over 8 million pounds for the NHS ina couple of days.
attributes.background:
A Knighthood for Captain Tom Moore to be given now.

This gentleman having served his country on Burma in WWII. Continues to selflessly serve his country at the age of 99 by raising over £8 million to help the NHS in the Corona Virus crisis. Giving him

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
